summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Nob Hill Avenue, from Galer Street to Howe Street, by the construction of watermains together with five hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9734 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
